#Script to split haplo file and generate consensus

== Summary ==

This script group spp sequences and generates consensus sequence from loc file.


== Details ==

=== Program logic flow ===
  * [http://xuhu-rwm-map.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/data/split_flowchart.pdf split_flowchart.pdf]

=== Parameters ===
  * Input loc file
  * windowsize and windowstep (optional)

=== Sample Command ===
{{{
$ python split_spps_v4.py haplo_test_50K.loc 0.1 0.05

BACP
BACQ
BACR
BACT
BACU
... ...
Please find log file at haplo_test_50K.log. 
}}}

=== Input and Output ===

  * Input file: -- loc file: [http://xuhu-rwm-map.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/data/haplo_test_50K.loc haplo_test_50K.loc]

  * Output file: -- log file: [[http://xuhu-rwm-map.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/data/haplo_test_50K.log haplo_test_50K.log]

  * Output group file: -- example file: [http://xuhu-rwm-map.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/data/BACP_0.out BACP_0.out]  [http://xuhu-rwm-map.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/data/BACQ_0.out BACQ_0.out]   [http://xuhu-rwm-map.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/data/BACR_0.out BACR_0.out]  [http://xuhu-rwm-map.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/data/BACT_0.out BACT_0.out] [http://xuhu-rwm-map.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/data/BACU_0.out BACU_0.out]
